trans-unit.source: Specifies the state of an axis.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisEnabled> enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Enabled%2A> property to enable or disable an axis.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisEnabled>列舉會搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Enabled%2A>屬性來啟用或停用軸。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Enabled%2A> property is set to Auto, an axis may or may not be displayed, depending on whether it is being used to plot a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Enabled%2A>屬性設定為 Auto，軸可能或可能不會顯示，根據是否使用它來繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>。

trans-unit.source: The axes that are used to plot data for a series are determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XAxisType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YAxisType%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: 取決於用來繪製資料數列的座標軸<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XAxisType%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YAxisType%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: The axis is only enabled if it used to plot a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" />.
trans-unit.target: 座標軸只有在用於繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" /> 時才會啟用。
